name: Live RISE Engine Invocation (External Script)
description: A workflow to invoke the RISE Orchestrator via a dedicated Python script.

execute_rise_protocol.description: Runs the invoke_rise_script.py to perform the strategic analysis.

inputs.code: import subprocess; import sys; result = subprocess.run([sys.executable, 'invoke_rise_script.py'], capture_output=True, text=True); print(result.stdout); sys.exit(result.returncode)
